AnniversaryEvents.description: We're kicking off our 50th anniversary year celebrations with a sevens tournament in July. As if that wasn't good enough, we're also having a BBQ and music! So bring your friends and family down for a cracking day of rugby, food, drinks and laughs.

AnniversaryEvents.event: Presidents XV v Thurston with Pre-Match Lunch
AnniversaryEvents.description: The club presidents finest 15 take on the Rangers in this special fixture. The match will be preceded by a lunch to get everyone ready for the big game.
Sportsmans dinner held at the clubhouse with guest speaker Jason Leonard.
To celebrate the 50th anniversary of the club, the club is going on tour to Ibiza for the beach rugby tournament.
The event to cap off our 50th Season celebrations, it's going to be big one!
